wikipedia_page.main:
Laurance Lyon (1875 – 12 November 1932) was a British Conservative Party politician
He was elected Member of Parliament for Hastings at the 1918 general election, but resigned his seat in the House of Commons on 13 April 1921.

link_mentions.page: List of MPs elected in the 1918 United Kingdom general election

response: The Hastings by-election of 1921 was held on 4 May 1921.  The by-election was held due to the resignation of the incumbent Coalition Unionist MP, Laurance Lyon.  It was won by the Coalition Unionist candidate Eustace Percy.
